title: Prime 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath in Ravenswood, Available: Now

Wolcott', 'Ravenswood', 'Beautiful two bedroom, one bathroom in the heart of Ravenswood!', 'Unit features rehabbed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, separate dining room, large living room with ceiling fan, huge bedrooms, great closet space, rehabbed bathroom, laundry in unit, pets welcome, and just steps to shopping, nightlife, transportation, and more!', 'UA1701', 'Please text Molly Parshall at 262/402-8414\u202c to schedule an appointment to view this apartment and mention Apartment ID: 21151.', 'Urban Abodes', '773.676.9000', '<URL>', '3923 N. Ashland Avenue', 'Chicago, IL 60613', 'Equal Opportunity Housing']
